casebody.data:
Sawyer, Respondent, v. Bennett, Appellant. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. March 31, 1892.) Action by Lucius W. Sawyer against James Gordon Bennett.

Argued before Van Brunt, P. J., and O’Brien and Ingraham, JJ.

No opinion. Motion denied, with $10 costs. See 18 N. Y. Supp. 24.
